Title: Gallowwalkers
Genre: Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Horror, Thriller, Western
Writer: Joanne Reay (screenplay written by), Andrew Goth (screenplay written by)
Actors: Wesley Snipes, Kevin Howarth, Riley Smith, Tanit Phoenix Copley
Plot: A cursed gunman (Snipes) whose victims come back from the dead recruits a young warrior to help in the fight against a gang of zombies.
